title: I’m having issues with using my ePhil ID (Paper type) or Digital National ID to verify my GCash account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Learn how to troubleshoot common issues when verifying your ePhil ID (Paper type) or Digital National ID with GCash.**

When you’re trying to get verified on GCash using your ePhil ID (Paper type) or Digital National ID, you will be required to undergo a selfie scan to validate your National ID records with the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA).

Note:

The PSA Selfie Scan is different from the selfie scan that GCash requires as a part of its own verification process.

### **Troubleshooting Tips for ID Verification**

- **Verify Personal Information:** Make sure that all information you enter matches your National ID exactly.
- **Check Internet Connection:** Ensure you have a stable internet connection for verification.
- **Use an Alternative ID:** If you can’t verify your ePhil or Digital National ID, you can try verifying with another accepted ID

You can download your Digital National ID via the [PSA website](https://national-id.gov.ph/) or the [eGov PH app](https://e.gov.ph/).
